String.string: Samael couldn't do anything if he sees Ciebel's recommendation.
Samael was making a deal with the gulas? I smell something fishy...
Report to Ciebel in the central passage in Velika.
Bring the letter of recommendation to {@LinkCreature:63#1311#Samael}.
"Do you know anything about those suspicious sailors?"
Take a pegasus to Cutthroat Harbor and speak with {@LinkCreature:62#1001#Siam}.
Find Perina (Jelena in disguise) in Cutthroat Harbor.
Talk to Bruke and find out what their mission is. [Use the {@LinkCreature:62#1027#Teleportal} to go to Vindicator Basecamp.]
You don't trust him but you follow him.
Follow Bruke to the rendezvous in the Mysterious Jungle.
Follow Bruke to the rendezvous in the Mysterious Jungle.
Where Bruke is making the deal
Tell "Perina" what you learned from Bruke.
Search Mistmoor Island and find the {@LinkCreature:212#1030#teleportal}.
Go to the Mysterious Jungle, but watch your back. [Use the {@LinkCreature:212#1030#Teleportal} to go to Paxomnia.]
Kill Bruke and bring proof of his betrayal.
Use the {@LinkCreature:438#1003#Exit Teleportal} and bring Samael's orders to "Perina" at the Vindicator Base Camp.
Bring Samael's orders to "Perina" at the Vindicator Base Camp.
